title: Luminary: Tea for "Salvador Dalí: The Image Disappears"
hero_caption: Salvador Dalí. Morphological Echo (detail), 1936. Collection of The Dalí Museum, St. Petersburg, FL (USA); Gift of A. Reynolds & Eleanor Morse, 2007.16. © Salvador Dalí, Fundació Gala-Salvador Dalí / Artists Rights Society (ARS), New York, 2022
short_description: Join exhibition curators and conservators for a Luminary tea inspired by Salvador Dalí: The Image Disappears, the first-ever Art Institute show devoted to the famed Surrealist. This festive event directly follows the public conversation "Discovering Dalí’s Dream of Venus" and features a variety of inspired treats in addition to coffee and tea. Curators Caitlin Haskell and Jennifer Cohen, as well as conservators Allison Langley and Katrina Rush, will be present to answer any questions sparked by the lecture or the exhibition.
list_description: Join exhibition curators and conservators for a Luminary tea inspired by Salvador Dalí: The Image Disappears.
description:
Join exhibition curators and conservators for a Luminary tea inspired by Salvador Dalí: The Image Disappears, the first-ever Art Institute show devoted to the famed Surrealist. This festive event directly follows the public conversation "Discovering Dalí’s Dream of Venus" and features a variety of inspired treats in addition to coffee and tea. Curators Caitlin Haskell and Jennifer Cohen, as well as conservators Allison Langley and Katrina Rush, will be present to answer any questions sparked by the lecture or the exhibition.

This event follows the 2:00 public program Conversation: Discovering Dalí’s Dream of Venus. Registration for the conversation is included with tea registration.

Attendance is exclusive to Luminary members, special guests, and exhibition sponsors. Invitations will be sent to eligible individuals, and advance registration by March 17 is required.

Contact Us

Interested in joining Luminary? Please reach out to us at luminary@artic.edu or (312) 443-3735 to begin enjoying the benefits of membership in this dedicated community of art enthusiasts, including exclusive opportunities with artists and curators, behind-the-scene tours, VIP tickets, and invitations to travel.

Attendance is exclusive to Luminary members, special guests, and exhibition sponsors.
